projects.name: Expressive Booklet
projects.subtitle: An accordian booklet that typographically expresses a song lyric.
projects.abstract: Using adobe illustrator I made this accordian book. It is about my favorite song and I wanted the colors and text style to show how the song makes me feel.
projects.change: I would fix the colors to one spot color instead of using the opacity to change it.

projects.name: Synthesize, Sketch, Critique
projects.subtitle: A sticker design for an ATLAS lab
projects.abstract: Using adobe illustrator I created this sticker design. I was given a specific lab and their website to freely create a sticker for them. It was based during a certain time period, the 80's, and I could use only a few colors.
projects.change: I would fix the colors to one spot color instead of using the opacity to change it.
